column2: "Na sɛ obiara dze edziban afɔr ayɛyɛdze rebrɛ EWURADZE a
column3: n’ayɛyɛdze no nyɛ isiam pa; na onhue ngo ngu do

column2: "na ɔmfa mbrɛ Aaron mbabanyin asɔfo no: na ɔmfa isiam pa
column3: nye no ngo no ne nsapuw
column4: ɔnye no krɔbɔw no nyinara: na ɔsɔfo no nhyew no dɛ nkaadze wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do
column5: ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE:"

column2: "na edziban afɔr no mu dza ɔbɛka no nyɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dze: ɔyɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr mu krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."
"Na sɛ edze edziban afɔr ayɛyɛdze a wɔto no wɔ fononoo mu bi rebɛba a
column3: fa isiam pa epitsi tatar a wɔafrɔw no ngo
column4: anaa epitsi tatar ntrɛtraba a wɔasera ho ngo."

column2: "Na sɛ w’ayɛyɛdze no yɛ ɔtosɛn mu edziban afɔr a
column3: ma ɔnyɛ isiam pa epitsi a wɔafɔw no ngo."
na hue ngo gu do: ɔyɛ edziban afɔr."

column2: "Na sɛ w’ayɛyɛdze no yɛ ɔkyesɛn mu edziban afɔr a
column3: fa isiam pa nye ngo yɛ."

column2: "Na fa edziban afɔr a wɔdze ndzɛmba yinom ayɛ no brɛ EWURADZE: wɔmfa mma ɔsɔfo no
column3: ma ɔmfa mbra afɔrmbukyia no ho."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nyi edziban afɔr no do nkaadze no
column3: na ɔnhyew no wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do: ɔyɛ ogya afɔr a oyi nka huanhuam ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na edziban afɔr no mu dza ɔbɛka no nyɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin dze: ɔyɛ EWURADZE ogya afɔr mu krɔnkrɔndze mu adzekrɔnkrɔn."
"Edziban afɔr biara a hom dze bɛbrɛ EWURADZE no
column3: mma wɔmmfa mbɔrkaw nnyɛ: na mma hom nnhyew mbɔrkaw
dɛ nduadzewakan ayɛyɛdze: na afɔrmbukyia no do dze
column4: na mma bi mmba mmbeyi nka huanhuam."

column2: "Na w’edziban afɔr ayɛyɛdze biara fa nkyen to mu; nkyii so mma wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu nkyen no mmpa w’edziban afɔr mu: w’ayɛyɛdze nyinara mu fa nkyen ka ho bra."
"Na sɛ edze nduadzewakan ayɛyɛdze rebrɛ EWURADZE a
column3: fa eburow mbɛtsem a wɔatoto no ogya mu
column5: yɛ wo nduadzewakan mu ayɛyɛdze bra."

column3: na fa krɔbɔw to do: ɔyɛ edziban afɔr."

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no nhyew ne nkaadze no
column5: nye no krɔbɔw no nyinara; ɔyɛ ogya afɔr ma EWURADZE."
